name: Hubot for Telegram
description: One-button deploy for Hubot on Heroku with Telegram adapter.

HEROKU_URL.description: Url of this app so hubot can regularly ping himself to stay awake.

TELEGRAM_TOKEN.description: The token that the BotFather gives you.

TELEGRAM_WEBHOOK.description: You can specify a webhook URL. The adapter will register TELEGRAM_WEBHOOK/TELEGRAM_TOKEN with Telegram and listen there.

TELEGRAM_INTERVAL.description: You can specify the interval (in milliseconds) in which the adapter will poll Telegram for updates. This option only applies if you are not using a webhook.
